titles.title: Delivering Over-the-Counter Hearing Aids Now Act
Delivering Over-the-Counter Hearing Aids Now Act
A bill to instruct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to issue regulations regarding over-the-counter hearing aids.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services
Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation

bill.summary:
Delivering Over-the-Counter Hearing Aids Now Act
This bill requires the Food and Drug Administration to issue a final rule within 30 days of the bill's enactment that allows for over-the-counter hearing aids.
